data.text:
Click Place Nozzle Command on the vertical toolbar.

Select the parent equipment or equipment component to which to add a nozzle. The Nozzle Properties Dialog displays.

On the Occurrence Tab (Nozzle Properties Dialog), select Foundation Port as the type of nozzle to place from the Port Type list.

The properties and values update to reflect those for foundation ports. See Foundation Port Properties Dialog.

On the Occurrence Tab (Nozzle Properties Dialog), in the Value grid, type values for the listed properties.

The Type property selection updates the other properties in the grid. For more information on the property changes per type, see Occurrence Tab (Foundation Port Properties).

Click the Location Tab (Nozzle Properties Dialog), and select a placement type from the Placement Type list box.

If you select the Position by Point placement type, the z-axis appears with the foundation port during placement for more precise orientation with the equipment object.

In the Value grid, type the values for the listed properties. These location properties are dimensions relative to the selected parent.
